name: Custom User Registration and Login Plugin
author: CreativeMindsSolutions

sections.description:
Pro Plugin Page | Videos | User Guide

Improve user login and user registration WordPress experience with AJAX-based custom login and registration forms.

Improve WordPress login and WordPress user registration experience by letting users stay on the same page after login. Control who can register to your site.

Using a shortcode you can add a login widget to your website sidebar.

Registration Plugin Premium Editions

The Registration Plugin Premium editions includes even more powerful features, such as: Invitation codes for user registration support, payment support using WooCommerce and Easy Digital Downloads, set user role, support social login and much more.

Registration Plugin Introduction Video

Use Cases

  • One Page User Login and User Registration – Users log in and register from a popup box, allowing them to stay on the same page after the successful login or registration.
  • Email Verification (premium only) – Require email verification when new users register from up to two different email addresses for added security.
  • Custom Registration Form Builder (premium only) – Add questions to your custom registration form based on user role.
  • Shortcodes – All login and registration functionality is also supported using shortcode, allowing you to place custom login and registration forms on any page or post.
  • Invite Only User Registration (premium only)– Manage new users by restricting the user registration to invited members only.
  • Limited Use Invitation Codes (premium only) – Limit the number of users for each invitation code group.
  • Time-Restricted User Registration (premium only) – Limit user registration invitation codes for a specific time period.
  • Assign User Roles (premium only) – Set default user roles to be assigned once a user completes the registration process for each invitation code.
  • Forgot Password Option (premium only) – Display lost password form or link under the login form by using a shortcode.

Basic Features

  • Show a popup div for user login and user registration
  • Ajax based user login and user registration
  • Stay at the same page after login
  • Shortcodes support

Pro Version Features

Pro Version Detailed Features List

  • ReCaptcha support
  • Invitation codes support
  • Email verification support
  • Automatically remove users who haven’t verified their email
  • Change all plugin labels easily
  • Set user role while registrating
  • User Role Manager Tool
  • Add additional registration forms
  • Create by user role registration form
  • Custom Email templates
  • Edit profile after registration
  • Facebook / Google registration and login
  • Limit Registration and Login from Specific IPs
  • Limit Login Attempts
  • Widgets support
  • Export all user data to a CSV file
  • Integrate with membership plugins
  • CM Business Directory Integration
  • Gravity Forms Support
  • Payment support

Addons

  • Bulk Email Invitation codes AddOn
  • Approve New Users Addon
  • Registration Payment Support AddOn
  • Content Access Restriction

Follow Us

Blog | Twitter | LinkedIn | YouTube | Pinterest | FaceBook

Suggested Plugins by CreativeMinds

List of all WordPress Plugins by CreativeMinds

  • CM ToolTip Glossary – Easily creates a Glossary, Encyclopaedia or Dictionary of your website’s terms and shows them as a tooltip in posts and pages when hovering. With many more powerful features.
  • CM Download Manager – Allows users to upload, manage, track and support documents or files in a download directory listing database for others to contribute, use and comment upon.
  • CM Answers Plugin – A fully-featured WordPress Questions & Answers Plugin that allows you to build multiple discussion forum systems Just like StackOverflow, Yahoo Answers and Quora, Now with MicroPayment and Anonymous posting support!
  • CM Restrict Content – A full-featured, powerful membership solution and content restriction plugin for WordPress. Support access by role to content on your site.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Add a shortcode [cmreg-login]Text[/cmreg-login] or css class cmreg-login-click to a menu

sections.reviews:
does not work

By iaropolch on January 17, 2024

does not work

Quality

By thxthanks2 on January 4, 2018

Finally, a plugin that simplifies the login process. It opens a pop up window and you either register or login. Elegant, well-done, and the tutorial video tells you had to add the proper css class to the login link so that it will open the pop up. Thanks!

very good

By mahsa pour on December 23, 2017

This Plugin Is Really Good Thank You

Elegant design. best performance. Highly recommended

By shashinasiri on October 7, 2017

Elegant design. best performance. Highly recommended

Confused

By pinside (riobermano) on March 24, 2017

Poor Doc

Poor integration with other products, limited features, and poor documenatation

By catonezillion on December 7, 2016

I was prompted to use this plugin because I was already using the cm answers plugin. Using both is a disorganized mess. There is no documentation on any overlap between the two plugins, and the admin can't make basic choices about which of the redundant features to use on any given page. Also, as this is a registration plugin, and there is an option in the premium version to add unique fields to the registration form, I was hoping I could display user profiles. There is even a section of the features stating the following: "Plugin provide a shortcode which can be placed in the user dashboard to edit his profile. This includes support for custom fields added using the registration plugin" I assumed this meant that the profiles could be displayed on the frontend if the admin wanted to. Unfortunately this is not an option. I was also hoping that it would allow admin to hide WP dashboard and toolbar for subscribers but it does not. So read the description and take it very literally. I wouldn't be surprised if there are other free registration plugins out there that provide a lot more than this one does.

Helpful Plugin

By courtneyljones2 on September 3, 2016

Managed to launch a new site and send invitation codes to users. Plugin was easy to use. The support was as described too.

A nice plugins

By Hatsune miki (mikifuns) on September 3, 2016

It's Good，And It's very easy.But If you add something like translate ourself..I't very useful for other language user.

short_description: Improve user experience with a popup login and registration form widget using AJAX.
